industryId.description: Which industry best describes your business?

legalStructureId.header: ## Legal Structure of Your Existing Business
legalStructureId.description: Please select the legal structure used when you registered your business in your home state. You can find your legal structure on your original `Certificate of Formation|certificate-formation`.

municipality.description: Where in New Jersey will your primary business activities be?
municipality.placeholder: Type in the town name (i.e Newark, Jersey City, etc)
